name: You are a Triangle
description:
Game made during the 2020 GMTK Game Jam, with the theme OUT OF CONTROL

YOU ARE A TRIANGLE

And that's the only  thing you can count on. Anything else may change in the future. You need to survive as many waves of squares as possible, but everytime you do so, something in the gameplay changes. You could forget how to move, or you could become  uncontrolably fast. As the number of waves you survived goes up , the number of enemies grows. 

But fear not! If you ever find yourself in a tricky situation look out for these :

 

These Power-Ups can help you get temporarly stronger for one wave of enemies and increase your total score. However they are pretty rare so be sure not to waste them.

GOOD LUCK, YOU'LL NEED IT!
